message:
Hello! My name is Vatslav! I am inviting you to my 1 month beginners guitar course. "learn to play the guitar in 1 month" . This course is orientated for beginners only. The course will include 2 classes per week, which are 1.5 hours each, with a maximum of 4 students per class. After one month I can guarantee you will have the basic skills, and knowledge to feel confident enough to be able to play a number rhythms and tunes, and then continue to learn the guitar at your own pace, and in your own way.
The lessons can be conducted in English, Russian, or Polish. The courses will begin on the 5th of June 
For more information, please feel free to contact me! Vatslav

Poszukujemy wokal do skladu! 
Ruszamy z autorskim projektem, wokal bedzie dla nas praktycznie najwazniejszy! 
Szukamy takiej osoby, ktora poprzez glos (czasem subtelny, a czasem rockowy), dzwieki i tekst bedzie potrafila wyrazic prawde. Osoby, ktora nie bedzie bala sie pisac i wykonywac wlasnych tekstow. A teksty te beda scisle nawiazywaly do melodii, aby tekst i melodia wynikaly jedno z drugiego.
